metadata.name: Stakeholder Analysis Matrix with Power-Interest Grid
metadata.description: Comprehensive stakeholder identification and analysis template with power-interest grid, communication plan, and engagement strategies for requirement gathering

content:

## 6. Engagement Strategies

### For Key Players (High Power, High Interest)
**Strategy:** Manage Closely
- Involve in decision-making processes
- Regular 1-on-1 meetings
- Early preview of deliverables
- Seek input and feedback frequently
- Address concerns immediately

**Action Items:**
- [ ] {{ACTION_1}}
- [ ] {{ACTION_2}}
- [ ] {{ACTION_3}}

### For High Power, Low Interest
**Strategy:** Keep Satisfied
- Provide executive summaries
- Escalate only critical issues
- Quarterly progress updates
- Respect their time constraints

**Action Items:**
- [ ] {{ACTION_4}}
- [ ] {{ACTION_5}}

### For Low Power, High Interest
**Strategy:** Keep Informed
- Regular project updates
- Invite to demos and reviews
- Respond to questions promptly
- Leverage as advocates

**Action Items:**
- [ ] {{ACTION_6}}
- [ ] {{ACTION_7}}

### For Low Power, Low Interest
**Strategy:** Monitor
- Include in general communications
- Monitor for changes in interest/power
- Keep on distribution lists

**Action Items:**
- [ ] {{ACTION_8}}

---
